column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////To make things crazier
column2: the coffee was also straight-up excellent.  They were serving the latest Amaya Roastery offering.  And
column4: you can get refills!  The environment is modern
column6: and filled with happy customers.  Given how good the food was
column7: I was expecting a snobby set
column8: but it wasn't that at all.
